version_description:
Bug fixes.
Improved user experience.
New art and gameplay.
The empire expands to a new Village! Can you beat all your foes and rule Troy? Spin great rewards and find awesome treasures as the journey expands!

Spin great rewards and find awesome treasures in 3 new villages! Travel the great savannas of Africa, dive under the sea and visit Atlantis, travel in time and conquer The Future village!
Can you reach them before your friends?

Conquer the new Global and Country Leaderboards! Spin great rewards and find awesome treasures in 7 new villages! The Jungle, Wonderland ,Miners, The Arctic, Apocalypse, Candy Land and Army Camp Villages are waiting for you to discover!
Can you reach them before your friends?

Conquer the new Global and Country Leaderboards! Spin great rewards and find awesome treasures in 7 new villages! The Jungle, Wonderland ,Miners, The Arctic, Apocalypse, Candy Land and Army Camp Villages are waiting for you to discover!
Can you reach them before your friends?

Spin great rewards and find awesome treasures in 6 new villages! Oil Tyrant, La Familia, Area 51, Night of the Dead, Russia and Zoo Villages are waiting for you to discover!
Can you reach them before your friends?

Get into the holiday spirit with this festive update!
• Holiday theme and characters throughout the game
• The time for gifting - send and receive coins and spins from your friends
• Watch out for Holiday Sales!

Update now to make your spins count!
- More Special Offers!
- More Rewards!
- Tons of Game improvements!

- More Special Offers!

Conquer the Global and Country Leaderboards! Spin great rewards and find awesome treasures in new villages! Can you reach them before your friends?
Conquer the Global and Country Leaderboards! Spin great rewards and find awesome treasures in new villages! Can you reach them before your friends?

Enjoy a gaming adventure of a lifetime with awesome new updates!

New to the game? Welcome & build your way through the endless fun!
Returning player? Welcome back! Your village missed you!

So what is the Coin Master buzz about?
Connect with other Coin Masters by joining our social community on Instagram, Twitter and Facebook
No more sneaky BUGS! They have been squashed by Thor's mighty hammer
Exciting new events with opportunities to WIN BIG!
And more to come ... So watch this space :)

- Bugs crushed by Thor’s mighty hammer!
- More villages to conquer and cards to collect!
- New ways to invite friends! (who will later be crushed by your attacks. hahaha! )
- Win BIG! in daily live events and challenges and reap awesome rewards!
- Lucky winners get EPIC rewards on the Jackpot!

- Bugs crushed by Thor’s mighty hammer!
- More villages to conquer and cards to collect!
- Win BIG! in daily live events and challenges and reap awesome rewards!
- Lucky winners get EPIC rewards on the Jackpot!

Hey Coin Masters! Exciting and new updates are here to improve your gaming experience with us!
New to the game? Welcome & Join the FUN!
Returning player? Welcome back! We missed you!

Be connected with us by joining our community on Facebook and Instagram!
If you have any issues, feel free to use our in-game support feature! We are here to support you!
All Bugs have been squashed! Foxy did a great job at this!
Polished technical improvements are now in place! Thor's mighty hammer did the trick!

Hey Coin Masters! Enjoy an improved gaming adventure with these awesome new updates!

New to the game? Welcome & join the endless fun!
Returning player? Welcome back! You were certainly missed!

So what is the buzz about?
* Get connected with your fellow Coin Masters by joining our social community on Instagram and Facebook
* Bugs? Worry no more! They have been squashed forever by Thor's mighty hammer
* Seeking easier and more action-packed game play? Flawless technical improvements at your service!
* Plus more to come ... So stay tuned :)

Enjoy a gaming adventure of a lifetime with awesome new updates!

Exciting new events with opportunities to WIN BIG!
And more to come ... So watch this space :)

Be sure to update your game for the best user experience!

We have fresh developments on the horizon... Stay Tuned by joining our community on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!

Enjoying Coin Master? Give us a review :)

We constantly strive to provide you with the supreme gameplay experience you deserve!
Our latest version includes performance improvements and bug fixes.

Hey Coin Masters!
We have new updates to improve your gameplay!
Our latest version includes bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Stay tuned by joining our community via Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!

Enjoying Coin Master? Please review us;)

Enjoy the excitement of the HOLIDAYS SEASON with this Coin Master update!
Starting now, we're celebrating the most wonderful time of the year with seasonal events & graphics!
There's so much to be thankful for this Thanksgiving with a feast of delicious rewards when you WIN BIG in 'The Turkey Trot' and 'The Great Catch' will make you gobble till you wobble!
'Tis the Season for SNOWING REWARDS all holiday long! Get in a HOLLY JOLLY spirit as you 'Deck the Halls' and 'Save Santa's Village', then win top stocking stuffer from the 'Reindeer Run Tournament'! Just don't get stuck in the 'Mistletoe Mystery Tournament' with the GRINCH!
Be sure your game is up to date so you can celebrate the holidays with us! Invite your friends to play Coin Master & get your FREE REWARDS! We also recommend joining our community on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for more fun & excitement. Enjoying Coin Master? Leave us your review!

Our newest version also includes bug fixes and performance enhancements.
